source.name: IDA Statement of Credits and Grants  - Latest Available Snapshot
source.description:
The International Development Association (IDA) credits are public and publicly guaranteed debt extended by the World Bank Group. IDA provides development credits, grants and guarantees to its recipient member countries to help meet their development needs. Credits from IDA are at concessional rates. Data are in U.S. dollars calculated using historical rates. This dataset contains the latest available snapshot of the IDA Statement of Credits and Grants. The World Bank complies with all sanctions applicable to World Bank 
transactions.

datasets.name: IDA: Summary of Current Credits for Iraq
datasets.description: Summary lending data comprising total approved, disbursed and undisbursed amounts together with borrower obligation (outstanding & overdue amounts) of all current developmental IDA credits as of the date indicated. Borrower obligation does not include grants as they are not repayable. Amounts are rounded to billions of US$ equivalent converted as of the date indicated. Current credits include credits that have not been fully repaid, terminated or cancelled.

Borrower obligation does not include grants as they are not repayable. Amounts are rounded to billions of US$ equivalent converted as of the date indicated. Current credits include credits that have not been fully repaid, terminated or cancelled.

datasets.name: Malawi - original principle by project
datasets.description: The International Development Association (IDA) credits are public and publicly guaranteed debt extended by the World Bank Group. IDA provides development credits, grants and guarantees to its recipient member countries to help meet their development needs. Credits from IDA are at concessional rates. Data are in U.S. dollars calculated using historical rates. This dataset contains the latest available snapshot of the IDA Statement of Credits and Grants.

Data are in U.S. dollars calculated using historical rates. This dataset contains the latest available snapshot of the IDA Statement of Credits and Grants.

datasets.name: IDA: Summary of Current Credits for Pakistan

IDA provides development credits, grants and guarantees to its recipient member countries to help meet their development needs. Credits from IDA are at concessional rates. Data are in U.S. dollars calculated using historical rates. This dataset contains the latest available snapshot of the IDA Statement of Credits and Grants. The World Bank complies with all sanctions applicable to World Bank 
transactions.
